officeModal.contactMessage: Duhamagare ku byerekeye serivisi zacu. Turi hano kugufasha mu byose by'ubucuruzi.

globalOffices.mapSubtitle: Sura amabiro yacu ku isi yose
globalOffices.listSubtitle: Shakisha iro ry'umubiro riri hafi yawe

teamMembers.title: Itsinda Ryacu ry’Isi Yose
teamMembers.subtitle: Menya abahanga bakurikirana ubuhanga mu ma ofisi yacu yose
teamMembers.noMembers: Nta bantu bari mu itsinda basanzwe bashinzwe iyi ofisi

pierre-kemeni.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre-kemeni.title: Umuyobozi Mukuru & Umukuru w’Inama
pierre-kemeni.bio: Umunyamuryango, Umuyobozi Mukuru muri EXCI-MAA Group. Umucungikonti wemewe na COSUMAF hamwe na Auditor wemewe n’amategeko. Yanditswe muri ICPAR, ONECCA, CPA Canada, Quebec, Ontario na UK. Yari Umuyobozi w’Inshingano muri Deloitte Toronto. Umuhango mu buyobozi, SYSCOHADA, guhindura konti. Umujyanama w’Abahanga b’amahanga n’umutoza.

patrick-ngatcha.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick-ngatcha.title: Umunyamuryango - Umuyobozi Mukuru
patrick-ngatcha.bio: Umucungikonti wanditswe muri Institute of Chartered Accountants ya Paris Ile de France. Auditor wemewe n’amategeko. Umuhango mu misoro n’isuzuma ry’imari, isuzuma ry’ubuguzi, gufatanya (itegeko 99-02 / IFRS).

cloudin-ngong.name: Cloudin NGONG
cloudin-ngong.title: Umuyobozi - Ishami ry’Ubugenzuzi
cloudin-ngong.bio: Umunyeshuri w’imari w’umuhango mu misoro n’isuzuma ry’imari. Yongera kuyobora ibikorwa by’ishami ry’ubugenzuzi.

janot-hiag.name: Janot HIAG
janot-hiag.title: Umushikiranganji & Isuzuma ry’Igiciro cy’Ipétrole
janot-hiag.bio: Umuhango mu isuzuma ry’igiciro cy’ipétrole, umutekano w’amafranga yinjira, urutonde rw’ibintu n’ihinduka ry’igiciro, isuzuma ry’ibikorwa n’amategeko, hamwe n’isuzuma ry’amategeko.

eric-kabeza.name: Eric KABEZA
eric-kabeza.title: Umunyamuryango Mukuru w’Imisoro - Rwanda
eric-kabeza.bio: Umuhango mu misoro y’igihugu n’amahanga hamwe n’imyaka isaga 20 akora muri Rwanda Revenue Authority. Umujyanama/Umujyanama mu misoro y’amasosiyete n’abantu ku giti cyabo. Umunyamabanga w’ukurikiza imisoro n’umushungura w’amategeko.

jean-nahimana.name: Jean Berchmas
jean-nahimana.title: Umunyamuryango - Isuzuma ry’Imari n’Imisoro
jean-nahimana.bio: Umucungikonti, Umunyamuryango wa ICPAR. Isuzuma ry’imari n’imisoro. Umunyeshuri Mukuru w’imikoreshereze n’umwibutsa w’imari w’umuhango n’uburambe mu igenamigambi ry’imari n’ishungura.

martin-nkwain.name: Marcel NKWAIN
martin-nkwain.title: Umuyobozi w’Intara - Afrika y’Iburasirazuba
martin-nkwain.bio: Umuhango wa HARDCAT mu kuyobora ibintu by’umutungo. Isuzuma ry’imari n’imisoro. Umujyanama w’amahanga n’umutoza uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Afrika y’Iburasirazuba.

paul-tchamake.name: Olivier Fodji
paul-tchamake.title: Umunyamuryango - Imisoro y’Amahanga & Igiciro cy’Intara
paul-tchamake.bio: Umucungikonti wemewe (Sisitemu y’Amerika na France). Umuhango mu misoro y’amahanga, ASC 740 (Amabwiriza ya US GAAP). Imyaka isaga 15 y’uburambe mu bitangaza imari n’imisoro y’amahanga hamwe n’uburambe muri Big 4 muri KPMG na PwC Amerika. Umuhango mu giciro cy’intara na BEPS.

diane-dusabe.name: Diane DUSABE
diane-dusabe.title: Umuyobozi w’Ofisi - Burundi
diane-dusabe.bio: Umuyobozi w’ofisi w’uburambe uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Burundi. Umuhango mu mibanire y’abakiriya n’iterambere ry’ubucuruzi bw’ahandi.

onesphore-ofodji.name: Onesphore OFODJI
onesphore-ofodji.title: Umujyanama Mukuru - Burundi
onesphore-ofodji.bio: Umujyanama w’ubucuruzi w’umuhango mu iterambere ry’amasoko y’intara na serivisi z’inama z’imari ku bucuruzi muri Burundi.

congo-director.name: Umuyobozi w’Intara
congo-director.title: Umuyobozi - Ibikorwa bya RDC
congo-director.bio: Uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, aganira ku bikorwa by’isuzuma na serivisi z’inama z’ubucuruzi.

gabon-manager.name: Umuyobozi w’Intara
gabon-manager.title: Umuyobozi - Ibikorwa bya Gabon
gabon-manager.bio: Kuyobora serivisi za EXCI-MAA muri Gabon aganira ku isuzuma ry’imari na serivisi z’inama z’amasosiyete ku bakiriya b’ahandi n’amahanga.

dubai-consultant.name: Umujyanama Mukuru
dubai-consultant.title: Umujyanama w’Ubucuruzi Mukuru - Dubai
dubai-consultant.bio: Umuhango mu gutangiza ubucuruzi bw’amahanga n’igenamigambi ry’imisoro ku masosiyete ashyiraho amasoko muri Aziya y’Uburasirazuba.

france-partner.name: Umunyamuryango
france-partner.title: Umunyamuryango - Ibikorwa bya France
france-partner.bio: Uyobora ibikorwa by’Uburaya n’ubuhanga mu kurikiza amategeko ya EU na serivisi z’inama z’ihuzamahanga.

canada-consultant.name: Umujyanama Mukuru
canada-consultant.title: Umujyanama w’Abimukira & Imisoro
canada-consultant.bio: Umuhango mu serivisi z’ubumukira bwa Canada n’igenamigambi ry’imisoro y’amahanga ku bimukira bashya na masosiyete.

footer.description: Ikigo cy'ubucuruzi, cy'ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo cyifite Ofisi dufite ku isi. Dutanga ubuhanga buhagije gufasha ibyo ukeneye.

hero.title: Ubucuruzi bw'ubuhanga &
hero.subtitle: Serivisi z'ubucuruzi, ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo zifite Ofisi dufite ku isi. Dutanga ibisubizo by'ubuhanga gufasha ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bwawe.
hero.description: Dutanga ibisubizo bishya mu by'ubukungu n'inama z'ubuyobozi zifasha ibigo n'abantu kwiyobora mu isoko ry'ubukungu rigoye bafite icyizere n'ubusobanuro.

about.feature2Desc: Gufasha abakiriya mu mahanga menshi n'amashyira

hero.description: Ikipe yacu y'abahanga b'ubucuruzi iteguye gufasha mu kuyobora ingorane z'ubucuruzi bwawe. Kwandikira binyuze mu nzira icyo ari cyo cyose cyo hepfo cyangwa dutangire ubutumwa buhagije.

hero.orFillOut: Cyangwa uzuze urupapuro rwacu rw'ubwoba kandi tuzagaruka mu masaha 24.

form.title: Kwandikira
form.subtitle: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa witeguye gutangira ubwoba bwawe? Uzuza urupapuro rwo hepfo kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka vuba.
form.description: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa witeguye gutangira ubwoba bwawe? Uzuza urupapuro rwo hepfo kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka vuba.
form.contactDescription: Uzuza urupapuro kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka mu masaha 24. Kugira ngo uhabwe ubufasha buhagije, nyamuneka dutangire buhagije.
form.mondayFriday: Ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
form.saturdaySunday: Ku wa Gatandatu - Ku cyumweru: Birafungiye
form.name: Izina
form.subject: Icyo ukeneye
form.successDescription: Murakoze kwandikira. Twakiriye ubutumwa bwawe kandi tuzagaruka mu masaha 24.
form.errorMessage: Kohereza ubutumwa byanze. Nyamuneka ugerageze nanone.
form.privacyNote: Tuzagaruka mu masaha 24. Amakuru yawe ari mu mutekano.

map.description: Dusura mu mabiro yacu yahagaze neza. Turimo gufasha mu byo ukeneye byose by'ubucuruzi.
map.helpDescription: Amabiro yacu yahagaze mu gace k'ubucuruzi kandi yoroshye kugera ku nzira z'ubucuruzi.

officeLocation.hours: Ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

faq.title: Ibibazo by'ubwoba
faq.description: Shakisha ibisubizo ku bibazo by'ubwoba ku serivisi zacu, uburyo bwo gukora, n'uburyo dushobora gufasha ubucuruzi bwawe gukura.

questions.question: Ni ikihe serivisi EXCI-MAA itanga?
questions.answer: Tutanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubucuruzi, ubugenzuzi, umusoro, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi zashyizweho ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba by'ibikoresho mu Arabiya Sawudite n'ibindi. Serivisi zacu zirimo raporo z'ubucuruzi, gutezimbere umusoro, ubugenzuzi bw'ubwoba, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi.

questions.question: Nshobora gute gutegura ubunyangamugayo?
questions.answer: Urashobora gutegura ubunyangamugayo binyuze mu gutangira amabiro yacu, kutangira imeyili, cyangwa gukoresha urupapuro rw'ubwoba ku rupapuro rwacu. Ikipe yacu izagaruka mu masaha 24 kugira ngo ikemeze umunsi wawe.

questions.question: Ni ikihe gikoresho mufite ubuhanga?
questions.answer: Dufite ubuhanga bw'ubwoba mu gukorana n'ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo ubwoba bw'abantu, ubwoba, kugurisha, ikoranabuhanga, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubwoba. Ikipe yacu ifite ubuhanga bwo gukora n'ingorane z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba z'ubwoba.

questions.question: Ni ikihe amasaha y'amabiro yanyu?
questions.answer: Amabiro yacu yafunguye kuva ku cyumweru kugeza ku wa Kane, 9:00 AM kugeza 6:00 PM. Turafungiye ku wa Gatanu na Gatandatu hamwe n'umunsi mukuru.

questions.question: Mutanga serivisi z'ubwoba cyangwa z'ubwoba?
questions.answer: Yego, tutanga ubunyangamugayo bw'ubwoba n'ubwoba kugira ngo dukemere ibyo abakiriya bacu bakeneye. Ikipe yacu ifite ibikoresho by'ubwoba by'ubwoba byo gutanga serivisi y'ubwoba ku bwoba.

questions.question: Mukemera gute ubwoba bw'amakuru n'ubwoba?
questions.answer: Dutanga ubwoba bw'amakuru ku bwoba. Amakuru yose y'abakiriya akorwa n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba kandi akurinda gukoresha uburyo bwo gukurinda bwo gukoresha, harimo ubwoba n'uburyo bwo gukurinda amakuru.

faq.stillHaveDescription: Ntushobora gushakisha igisubizo ushakisha? Ikipe yacu irimo gufasha. Kwandikira kandi tuzagaruka vuba.
faq.callDescription: Ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu, saa saba n'ijoro kugeza saa tatu n'ijoro
faq.expertsDescription: Ikipe yacu y'abahanga irimo gusubiza ibibazo icyo ari cyo cyose ushobora kugira.

pierre.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre.title: MBA, CPA, DEC
pierre.description: Umuhanga mu bucungamari no kugenzura, afite imyaka 10+ y'uburambe mu bikorwa mpuzamahanga.

patrick.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick.title: DEC, DSCG, Master CCA, MSTCF
patrick.description: Umuhanga mu bucungamari no kugenzura, afite imyaka 13+ mu guteza imbere ubucuruzi no mu bufasha mu by'imari.

hero.title: Ibyerekeye EXCI-MAA
hero.subtitle: Umufatanyabikorwa wawe w'ubucuruzi wizewe
hero.description: Hamwe n'imyaka irenga 10 y'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi, EXCI-MAA yabaye umufatanyabikorwa wizewe ku bikoresho mu mahanga menshi, itanga serivisi z'ubuhanga mu kubara, ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo.

mission.title: Intego yacu
mission.description1: Intego yacu nyamukuru ni ugufasha no kuyobora ibikoresho bikora mu isoko ry'Abanyafurika kugera ku bwoba bw'ubucuruzi. Dukoresha ubumenyi buhagije bw'ibice byose by'ubucuruzi n'ibitarabucuruzi, dutanga ubunyangamugayo, ubugenzuzi bw'amategeko, n'ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho ku bwoba bw'ikigo cyose.
mission.description2: Ibisubizo byacu byashyizweho gukemura ibyifuza by'ibikoresho ku gace kose ka Afurika, dutanga serivisi yose n'akamaro k'ukuri—ku giciro cy'ubwoba. Ikipe yacu ifite ubuhanga bwinshi n'ofisi dufite ku isi yose ihamya gufasha bwashyizweho, byashyizweho ku bwoba n'ubushobozi bw'ubwoba bwawe.

story.title: Inkuru yacu
story.description1: EXCI-MAA yashinzwe n'abahanga mu bugenzuzi, kubara, umusoro, ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi, sisitemu y'amakuru y'ubuyobozi, n'amategeko. Hamwe n'ubwoba mu Kanada, Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza, n'Afurika yose, duhana ubuhanga bw'isi bwashyizweho ku bwoba bw'umuturage wose.
story.description2: Dukora ku murongo wose w'akamaro k'ibikorwa by'abakiriya bacu, dukomeza ubwoba n'ukwemera n'abafatanyabikorwa. Ikigo cyacu kiyobora amashyira mu mahanga menshi binyuze mu murongo ukomeye n'amatsinda ku butaka, atanga serivisi y'ubwoba n'ibisubizo byashyizweho ku nyacyo z'umuturage.
story.description3: Uyu munsi, dukomeza kwongera ubwoba bwacu mugihe dukomeza kwizera ku ntego zacu z'ubwoba: ubwoba, kwemera, n'ingaruka. Kuva ku bugenzuzi bw'amategeko n'ibyemezo kugeza ku kuyobora ingorane n'ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho, amatsinda yacu atanga imirimo ikomeye n'ikora itanga ibisubizo bikomeye.
services: Gufasha ku bwoba bw'ubwoba, guhuza, gukora cyangwa guhindura
Ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho ku bikoresho n'ibikoresho bito n'ibyagutse

history.title: Urugendo rwacu
history.subtitle: Imyaka irenga 20 y'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi

timeline.title: Gushyiraho EXCI-MAA
timeline.description: Yashyizweho mu Yaoundé, Kameruni, hamwe n'intego yo gutanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubucuruzi n'ubucuruzi ku bikoresho by'umuturage.

timeline.title: Kwongera ku gace
timeline.description: Serivisi zongerewe gufasha Afurika yo hagati, zashyiraho amabiro mu nkengero z'ubucuruzi z'ingenzi ku gace.

timeline.title: Kwemera ku isi yose
timeline.description: Bahabwe kwemera ku isi yose ku bwoba bw'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi n'ubwoba bw'ukwemera.

timeline.title: Guhindura ikoranabuhanga
timeline.description: Byashyizweho ubuhanga bw'ubucuruzi bw'ubwoba bwo gufasha serivisi n'ubwoba bw'abakiriya.

timeline.title: Ofisi dufite ku isi yose
timeline.description: Byashyizweho ubufatanyabikorwa n'amashyira y'isi yose, serivisi zongerewe ku bakiriya mu mahanga 6+.

timeline.title: Ubwoba bw'ikipe
timeline.description: Ikipe yacu yongereye kugeza ku bahanga 50+, byongereye ubwoba bwacu nk'ikigo cy'ubwoba cy'ubucuruzi.

history.journeyContinues: Urugendo rwacu rukomeza mugihe dukomeza ubwoba mu serivisi yose dutanga.

values.title: Ibyiringiro byacu by'ingenzi
values.subtitle: Amabwiriza atuyobora mu kazi kacu kandi atanga umuco wacu

values.name: Ubwoba
values.description: Dukomeza gutanga serivisi z'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, dukomeza ubwoba bwacu n'uburyo bwo gufasha abakiriya.

values.name: Kwemera
values.description: Dukomeza ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, dukomeza ubwoba, kwemera, n'ubwoba mu bikorwa byacu byose.

values.name: Ubwoba
values.description: Dukomeza ikoranabuhanga gishya n'ibisubizo by'ubwoba gutanga serivisi z'ubwoba zifasha abakiriya bacu.

values.name: Gutekereza ku mukiriya
values.description: Dukomeza ubwoba bw'ubwoba bwo gusobanukirwa ibyifuza by'ubwoba by'abakiriya bacu no gutanga ibisubizo bwashyizweho bitanga akamaro k'ukuri.

values.name: Ubwoba
values.description: Dukomeza ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ubuhanga, kwemera, n'ubwoba mu byose by'akazi kacu.

values.name: Ubufatanyabikorwa
values.description: Dukomeza gukorana hafi n'abakiriya bacu, dukora nk'ubwoba bw'ikipe yabo kugera ku bwoba bw'ubwoba.

team.title: Hangana n'ubuyobozi bwacu
team.subtitle: Ikipe yacu ifite ubuhanga ihamye gutanga serivisi y'ubwoba n'akamaro ku bakiriya bacu.

members.name: Pierre Kemeni
members.bio: MBA, CPA, DEC hamwe n'imyaka irenga 10+ y'ubuhanga bw'isi mu kubara n'ubugenzuzi.

members.name: Patrick Ngatcha
members.bio: DEC, DSCG, Master CCA, MSTCF hamwe n'imyaka 13+ mu bwoba bw'ubucuruzi n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi.

members.name: Marie Laure Ngo Bikoi
members.bio: HEC, DSCG hamwe n'imyaka 15+ y'ubuhanga mu bugenzuzi n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi.

testimonials.title: Ibyemezo by'abakiriya
testimonials.subtitle: Ibyo abakiriya bacu bavuga ku twe

clients.title: Ibyo abakiriya bacu bavuga
clients.subtitle: Ntukemere amagambo yacu gusa. Dore ibyo abakiriya bacu bavuga ku serivisi zacu.

items.name: John Smith
items.quote: EXCI-MAA yadufashije cyane kunoza imikorere yacu y'imari. Ubumenyi bwabo ntibugira uko bungana.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.quote: Ababigize umwuga, b'inyangamugayo kandi bahora bahari mu gihe tubakeneye. Turabashima cyane!

items.name: Michael Brown
items.quote: Ikipe yabo yatugaragarije ubufasha buhebuje mu gihe twaguriraga ibikorwa hanze. Ubumenyi mpuzamahanga nyabwo.

hero.title: Hindura Ubucuruzi Bwawe na
hero.subtitle: Menya uko serivisi zacu z'ubukungu zisesuye zishobora guteza imbere ubucuruzi, zikanemeza ubuziranenge no kunoza imikorere y'ubucuruzi bwawe.

detailedServices.title: Serivisi Zacu
detailedServices.subtitle: Ibisubizo by'ubukungu byateguwe ku byo ukeneye byihariye kandi bituma habaho gukura kurambye.

accounting.title: Ibaruramari n'Itabo
accounting.shortDesc: Kubika no gutanga raporo z'imari zisesuye
accounting.description: Itsinda ryacu ry'ababizi mu ibaruramari ritanga serivisi z'itabo zisesuye kugira ngo imicungire y'imari yawe ibe iy'ukuri kandi ihoraho.

audit.title: Isuzuma n'Ubwishingizi
audit.shortDesc: Kwemeza imari yigenga no kubahiriza amategeko
audit.description: Serivisi zacu z'isuzuma zemeza ukuri kwa raporo zawe z'imari no kubahiriza amahame y'ibaruramari, kandi zifasha kunoza inzira zawe z'imari.

tax.title: Inama z'Imisoro
tax.description: Abahanga bacu batanga igenamigambi ry'imisoro n'ubahirizwa bw'amategeko kugira ngo ugabanye umutwaro w'imisoro utabangamiye kubahiriza amategeko yose.

advisory.title: Inama z'Ubucuruzi
advisory.description: Dufasha imiryango guhangana n'ibibazo by'ubucuruzi bigoye, kunoza imikorere no kugera ku gukura kurambye binyuze mu igenamigambi n'is实施.

risk.title: Gucunga Ingaruka
risk.description: Dufasha kumenya, gupima no kugabanya ingaruka zishobora kugira ingaruka ku ntego n'imikorere y'ubucuruzi bwawe.

hr.title: Abakozi n'Imishahara
hr.description: Dufasha gucunga umutungo w'ingenzi kurusha indi – abakozi – twubahiriza amategeko agenga umurimo.

training.title: Amahugurwa n’Iterambere
training.shortDesc: Programe z’amahugurwa y’umwuga n’amaserivise yo kwiyigisha ubumenyi
training.description: Ongera ubushobozi bw’itsinda ryawe hamwe na programe zacu zose z’amahugurwa n’iterambere. Duha ibisubizo by’amahugurwa byihariye byagenewe kunoza ubumenyi, kwemeza ubwizigirwa, no guteza imbere iterambere ry’umwuga muri sosiyete yawe yose.
features: Programe zo kwigisha ubumenyi bwa digitale

detailedServices.needCustomSolution: Ukeneye ibisubizo byihariye? Abahanga bacu barahari kugufasha.

process.title: Uburyo
process.subtitle: Uburyo bunoze bwo gutanga serivisi z'imari z'ubwiza zikwiranye n'ibyo ukeneye.

steps.title: Icyifuzo n'Igenamigambi
steps.description: Dukora gahunda yihariye ifite intego n'igihe.

steps.title: Kwinjiza Ikipe
steps.description: Dushyiraho itsinda rikwiriye kuri projet yawe.

steps.title: Is实施
steps.description: Dushyira mu bikorwa twitondewe kandi tugutanga amakuru y'iterambere.

steps.title: Inkunga ikomeza
steps.description: Tukomeza kugufasha no gutanga inama z'igihe kirekire.

process.readyDescription: Itsinda ryacu riteguye kukuyobora mu buryo bwacu no kuguha serivisi z'imari zidasanzwe.

chairman.title: Umufatanyabikorwa
chairman.subtitle:
Umuyobozi w'Inama y'Abayobozi
Umuyobozi w'iterambere
chairman.description: Ubuyobozi bwose n'uyobora bw'ubwoba bw'Itsinda rya EXCI-MAA.

qualityCompliance.title: Umufatanyabikorwa
qualityCompliance.subtitle: Umuyobozi w'Ubwoba n'Ukwemera
qualityCompliance.description: Yemeza ubwoba bw'ubwoba n'ukwemera mu kigo cyose.

countryDirector.title:
Umuyobozi w'Igihugu abacuruzi
ba Senior na Junior Auditors
countryDirector.description: Yobora ibikorwa by'igihugu hamwe n'ikipe y'abacuruzi n'ubwoba.

specialists.description: Ikipe y'abahanga b'ubwoba bw'ubunyangamugayo n'abahanga b'hanze.
